description:
Isuzu is a high school girl who started to play Elder Tale around when the Apocalypse happened. She is a bard, using her songs to increase her and her allies` stats and cast debuffs at groups of enemies. She first appears during the summer camp and becomes a close friend of Rundelhaus Code and is the first to learn that he is one of the People of the Land, later joining Log Horizon with him.
Source: Wiki
name: Isuzu
